annotations:
FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 19-08-2024 12:55:07   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17708399
ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL
MV FORTUNE TIGER - SMX - OPEN DANGJIN - 25 - 29TH AUG
Rob ifo/lsmgo about 1000/180mt
MV FORTUNE TIGER
FLAG/REGISTRY: HONG KONG
IMO NO. 9558282
CLASS: KR.
YEAR OF DELIVERY:2013
YARD OF BUILT: TSUNEISHI CEBU
DWT:58,159MT, DRAFT:12.826M,TPC 57.46MT
GRT/NRT: 32309/19458
LOA/BEAM: 189.99M/32.293M
5H/5H
GRAIN CAPACITY:
HOLD 1 12,720, NO.2 15,378, NO.3 15,321, NO.4 15,385, NO.5 13,886
TTL GRAIN CAPACITY 72,690CBM
Cargo Hatch Cover: 4 panel end folding type, Closed box girder Const,
Hydraulic, 700 mm cement hole
Cargo Gear (Deck Crane): 4 sets x SWL 30tons, hydraulic
Grabs: Four (4) sets x12 M3
Speed & FO Consumption :
Full speed:
About 14.00knots ballast on about consumption 30.0mt ifo
About 13.50knots laden on about consumption 30.0mt ifo
Eco Speed (wog)
About 12.50knots ballast on about consumption 23.00mt ifo
About 12.00knots laden on about consumption 23.50mt ifo
Consumption in port:
About 2.5mt ifo idle, about 6.0mt ifo working
Always plus about 0.20mt mdo per day at sea & port.
about means the allowance of 0.5 knot downwards for speed and 5% upwards for bunker consumption.
above figures are under good weather conditions upto and including beaufort scale 4 and total combined (sea ands) significant wave height confined to douglas sea state 3 (0.5 – 1.25 meter) influence of currents and swell to be taken into account for analyzing performance / positive current not to be debited to calculate vessel’s performance. deficiency in speed, if any, to be offset by the saving of ifo and/or mgo and vice versa. her performance to be calculated on both the laden and ballast legs, and extrapolation of good weather performance for bad weather period is not allowed. days without 24 hours of consecutive good weather should be removed from the good weather analysis during navigation in eca/seca area or stay at a port in eca/seca/eu and countries where vessel is required to burn lsmgo, guarantee consumption to be same figures basis consuming lsmgo instead of ifo/mdo.  the vessel is entitled to use diesel oil for main engine/generator engine when maneuvering in narrow/shallow waters, canals, rivers, entering into/staying in and/or sailing out of a port, shift of generator engine, ballast water exchange etc. under the discretion of the master. in case vessel runs at eco speed, before commencement of the voyage, charterers to send clear instruction to vessel to run at eco speed with above eco given figures clearly stated on the instruction.
Fuel oil and diesel oil shall be "RMG380 or better" and "DMB or better", respectively, and the specifications thereof shall be in accordance with ISO 8217 Fuel Standard,
Fourth Edition 2017, as updated from time to time. All values indicated in ISO 8217 specifications shall be considered as maximum allowable values.
Continuous drip samples shall be taken at the Vessel's bunker manifold for all bunker supplies.
In case the Charterers send the Vessel to European port(s), U.S. port(s) or other port(s) where high sulphur fuels are not permitted to be burned, the Charterers shall arrange
low sulphur IFO and/or low sulphur Marine Gas Oil ("DMA") with sulphur contents of less than 0.1% prior to entering such areas in order to accommodate and comply
with relevant regulations.
ADA
PLSD TO HEAR.
BEST REGARDS,
Tonnage Desk:
PG-WCI-Rsea-Safr: Nitin Sharma | Mob: +91 9311255654  | Skype: acpl.nithin@outlook.com
ECI-Seasia: Carlton Carlo | Mob: +91 77360 02067  | Skype: cid.971bb208b4e2c3bb
Seasia-FarEast: Arjun Chaudhary | Mob: +91 9667006958 | Skype: live:.cid.d66bb9d9c752a104
AS BROKERS ONLY
As Agents for Core Shipping Ltd.
Email: fix@aryacorp.com (Chartering) |  ops@aryacorp.com (Post Fixture)
Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/arya-corp-private-limited
Website: www.aryacorp.com
SHIPBROKING | BUNKERING | AGENCY & REPRESENTATION
